sentence: Despite the apparent equivalence between options, participants preferred to take the final turn rather than the two turns that were available earlier (see Figure 1 for abstraction of maze).
Our proposed study of flexibility utilizes the action continuation heuristic in a maze navigation task with fish (see Figure 1).
From there, a longer arm led to the exit into a goal compartment where the fish received food (see Figure 1).
Despite the apparent equivalence between options, participants preferred to take the final turn rather than the two turns that were available earlier (see Figure 1 for abstraction of maze).
